EmailTemplate.name: PHX COTA Cancel_Rebill Request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Phoenix COTA,
Please cancel the following accounting document(s).
Invoice number(s): <Insert any required information here>
Plant: <Insert any required information here>
Reason: <Insert any required information here>
Government: <Insert any required information here>
Send cancelation to customer: <Insert any required information here>
Send re-bill to customer: <Insert any required information here>
Corrections already made: <Insert any required information here>
Manually re-bill: <Insert any required information here>
Credit Card Payment: <Insert any required information here>
<Insert any additional information here>
To communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line.
Thank you, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
Honeywell Invoice Disputes Team
